sentence: i am pleased to note that some of our suggestions--including those authorizing depository institutions to pay interest on demand deposits, permitting the federal reserve to pay interest on balances held at reserve banks, and enhancing the board's flexibility to set reserve requirements--recently were passed by the full committee as part of h.r.
